description:
'You're going to have sex with my daughter.'
'Wha-'

The Fregrance family, one of the kingdom's five great noble families, had no sons, so as a desperate measure, they chose a young man from a branch family, had him have sex with a woman from the main family, and the resulting child would be the successor.
And the chosen one was me from a branch of a branch family and further branch from that branch family.
Thus, Lady Ritia, the eldest daughter of the head of the Fregrance family, and I would have sex in order to produce an heir.>
